page.title: 06EXTRACT 520/65 0467
page.content:
{ MAJOR LAND USES:} 16,14 {AMENITIES:}O4,O6,1O,19,28,29,37,49,5O
{CLUBS:}Various clubs eg.creche and women's group meet in the recently built community centre. Groups also meet in the Free Church of Scotland's bui;dings. {COMMUNICATIONS:}The telephone exchange and Post Office sorting office are in this square. {ECOLOGY:}Clumps of trees have been left for scenic purposes. {EDUCATION:}Peel Primary School serves Eliburn,Livingston Village and the west of Ladywell.There is an Adult Training Centre for the mentally disabled and disturbed. {EMPLOYMENT:}A new hospital is under construction to replace one built during World War 2. Next biggest sources of employment are the tax/
